name: Strandiced
description:
Can you survive on a raft in the middle of the ocean? There are dices floating in the ocean. If you pick one up, you will for example receive wooden planks, with the amount specified by the dice. Your health and the raft's health will slowly decrease, so you will have to make quick decisions on which dices you want to pick up.

Controls:

Movement: WASD

Interact/Pickup: E/F/LBM

If you have a pc that's like a toaster, but you still want to play this game, there is a simple options menu in game, so there might be a change it will still run!

For those wondering, the water is completely from Unreal Engine 5 self. I have only done some minor tweaks.
